docs.text: Create Action Reaction
docs.title: Actions

docs.text: CreateActionReaction CreateActionReaction Description Success Response Error Response URL : /actions/createActionReaction Method : POST Description  Use to create an action reaction Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" } Data constraints { "action": { "service": "Name of the services" : string, "actionName": "Name of the action element" : string, "data": "Data needed by the action" : {} }, "reaction": { "service": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionName": "Name of the reaction element": string, "data": "Data needed by the reaction": {} }, "title": "Title Of the ActionReaction" } Data example { "action": { "service": "GitHub", "actionName": "push", "data": { "githubName": "python", "repository": "numpy", "events": "push", "token": "tokenGithub" } }, "reaction": { "service": "Area", "reactionName": "send_mail", "data": { "email": "user.email@gmail.com", "object": "reaction push" } }, "title": "Test" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "add successfully" } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 404 If actionName is found or error while creating action { "msg": "Error while creating, maybe its an unknown actionName or internal server error" } 500 If Other error { "Depend of the error" }
docs.title: create Action Reaction

docs.text: CreateActionReaction Description Success Response Error Response URL : /actions/createActionReaction Method : POST
docs.title: CreateActionReaction

docs.text: Use to create an action reaction Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" } Data constraints { "action": { "service": "Name of the services" : string, "actionName": "Name of the action element" : string, "data": "Data needed by the action" : {} }, "reaction": { "service": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionName": "Name of the reaction element": string, "data": "Data needed by the reaction": {} }, "title": "Title Of the ActionReaction" } Data example { "action": { "service": "GitHub", "actionName": "push", "data": { "githubName": "python", "repository": "numpy", "events": "push", "token": "tokenGithub" } }, "reaction": { "service": "Area", "reactionName": "send_mail", "data": { "email": "user.email@gmail.com", "object": "reaction push" } }, "title": "Test" }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "add successfully" }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 404 If actionName is found or error while creating action { "msg": "Error while creating, maybe its an unknown actionName or internal server error" } 500 If Other error { "Depend of the error" }
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: CreateUser CreateUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/createUser Method : POST Description  Use to create a user in firebase with email password and username Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string, "username": "valid username": string } Data example { "email": "alexi@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", "username": "alexisFab" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User created please verify your email": string } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 If username , email , password are wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Create User

docs.text: CreateUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/createUser Method : POST
docs.title: CreateUser

docs.text: Use to create a user in firebase with email password and username Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string, "username": "valid username": string } Data example { "email": "alexi@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", "username": "alexisFab" }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User created please verify your email": string }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 500 If username , email , password are wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: DeleteUser DeleteUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/deleteUser Method : POST Description  Use to delete a user in firebase with token Header { "tokenID": "'Bearer' + TokenID provided by firebase": string } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User deleted": string } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: signUserProvider SignUserProvider Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/deleteUser Method : POST Description  Use to delete a user in firebase with token Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" : string } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { ".data": { "email": "email of the user": string, "name": "name of the user": string, "uid": "uid of the user": string, } } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: signUserProvider SignUserProvider Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/deleteUser Method : POST Description  Use to delete a user in firebase with token Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase": string } Data constraints { "user": "user settings provided by firebase": {} } Data example { "user": "..." } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { ".data": { "email": "email of the user": string, "name": "name of the user": string, "uid": "uid of the user": string, } } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: DeleteService DeleteService Description Success Response Error Response URL : /services/getUser Method : GET Description  Use to delete an ActionReaction from an User Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" : string } Data constraints { "id": "ID of the ActionReaction": string } Data example { "id": "5f7ds65": string } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "Deleted successfully": string, } Error Response Status Condition Response 401 Bad token { "msg": "Bad format Token" or firebaseError } 500 If firebase error { "firebaseError": "" } 500 If mongo error { "mongoDbError": "" }

docs.text: GetAllServices GetAllServices Description Success Response URL : /services/getAll Method : GET Description  Use to get all services available Success Response Code : 200 OK Content List of all services available { "services": [ { "name": "name of the service" : string, "reactions": ["Reaction of the services"] : array, "actions": ["Action of the services"] : array } ] } Reactions and Actions have the same body type as follow: { "name": "Name of the action/reaction" : string, "inputs": /*inputs needed from the action reaction*/ [ { "name": "name of the input" : string, "type": "type of the input" : string } ] }
docs.title: Get All Services

docs.text: GetAllServices Description Success Response URL : /services/getAll Method : GET
docs.title: GetAllServices

docs.text: Use to get all services available
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content List of all services available { "services": [ { "name": "name of the service" : string, "reactions": ["Reaction of the services"] : array, "actions": ["Action of the services"] : array } ] } Reactions and Actions have the same body type as follow: { "name": "Name of the action/reaction" : string, "inputs": /*inputs needed from the action reaction*/ [ { "name": "name of the input" : string, "type": "type of the input" : string } ] }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: GetService GetService Description Success Response Error Response URL : /services/getUser Method : GET Description  Use to get actions reactions of a user service Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "id": "ID of the action/reaction": string, "actionService": "Name of the service for the action": string, "actionElement": "Name of the element of the action": string, "inputAction": "Input needed for the service action": string, "reactionService": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionElement": "Name of the element of the reaction": string, "inputReaction": "Input needed for the service reaction": string, } Error Response Code : 404 not found Status Condition Response 404 If error from Firebase { "firebaseError": "" }
docs.title: Get Service

docs.text: GetService Description Success Response Error Response URL : /services/getUser Method : GET
docs.title: GetService

docs.text: Use to get actions reactions of a user service Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + tokenId from firebase" }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "id": "ID of the action/reaction": string, "actionService": "Name of the service for the action": string, "actionElement": "Name of the element of the action": string, "inputAction": "Input needed for the service action": string, "reactionService": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionElement": "Name of the element of the reaction": string, "inputReaction": "Input needed for the service reaction": string, }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Code : 404 not found Status Condition Response 404 If error from Firebase { "firebaseError": "" }
